name: Capcom Generation 5: Dai 5 Shuu Kakutouka Tachi
name_original: Capcom Generation 5: Dai 5 Shuu Kakutouka Tachi
description:
Capcom Generation 5: Dai 5 Shuu Kakutouka Tachi (カプコン・ジェネレーション　～第５集　格闘家たち～) is a Compilation/Fighting video game published by Capcom released on December 3rd, 1998 for the Sony PlayStation & Sega Saturn.
Contains:
Street Fighter II
Street Fighter II’ (Dash)
*Street Fighter II’ (Dash) Turbo
